Articles.Content: I wonder does SQUAD considered making translation to other languages, Like Polish, Russian, Deutch and so on,

Squad are adding code to handle this in the future, but there is no information on supported languages at this time.

So the answer is "Yes".

[quote name='sal_vager']Squad are adding code to handle this in the future, but there is no information on supported languages at this time.

So the answer is "Yes".[/QUOTE]

Anyway, don't Forgot Poland ;)
[video=youtube;mahTGNIk4q4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mahTGNIk4q4[/video]
